# icon

**Type Property**

A key for a corresponding value that is a dragging item’s image.

## Declaration

```swift
static let icon: NSDraggingItem.ImageComponentKey
```

## Constants

- **label**: A key for a corresponding value that represents a textual label for a dragging item, for example, a file name.

items.description: A key for a corresponding value that represents a textual label for a dragging item, for example, a file name.
items.name: label

title: icon
